text:
@CNNSotu With a over 90% recovery rate COVID-19 is not as deadly as they want us to believe. What's really going on. 
How was Hillary Clinton's testimony? You never talk about her in court but we haven't forgotten

domain.name: TV Shows
domain.description: Television shows from around the world

entity.name: State of the Union
entity.description: Hosted by CNN's chief Washington correspondent Jake Tapper and journalist Dana Bash, "State of the Union" features one-on-one interviews with top newsmakers on politics and policy. Often joined by a round table of expert guests, the Sunday morning program covers Washington, the country, and the world, and goes beyond the Beltway for a perspective on how everyday Americans are faring.

entity.name: COVID-19: Latest news updates from around the world
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
